Title: EU Commission wants to phase down coal faster than natural gas
Description: The EU Commission’s First Vice President Frans Timmermans wants to separate the phase-down of coal and natural gas in the COP27 final agreement so that countries phase down coal faster than gas. The energy crisis facing the EU has forced it to increase its reliance on coal and LNG while transitioning to climate neutrality.
Author: DE

Title: Bintulu LNG offtakers expect fire outbreak could delay feedgas pipeline’s restart
Description: A fire that broke out at the Sabah-Sarawak gas pipeline that supplies feed gas to the Petronas-operated 29.3 mtpa Bintulu LNG export complex in Malaysia could delay the pipeline’s return to operations beyond March, with it already offline since late September due to a leak caused by a landslide.
Author: CK
